column2: Cloud Compute with AWS / GCP / Azure
Work experience on Google Cloud Compute
Automation / Scripting Linux proficiency / Bin Bash / PowerShell
Automating workflows using shell scripting tools
Processing of data through standardized pipelines
Data Retrieval expertise using API's and WEB scraping techniques
Able to query large databases using SQL
Skilled in database schemas and relations
Python and or R using libraries like Pandas / Numpy / Scikit-learn
Modelling machine learning algorithms Regression / Classification / Deep learning
Evaluation of Machine Learning techniques monitoring the performance of the algorithms
Coaching junior data scientists on the team
Documenting your work is a must
